This is our rookie year, and we are considering using a dashboard. We plan to use either Shuffleboard or Elastic, but we are experiencing issues with plugin installation. Could you explain this matter in detail?

Please explain the issues you‚Äôre having. What youre trying to do, what youre expecting to happen, what its actually doing‚Ä¶ Include any errors you receive, perhaps a screenshot.

Highly recommend Elastic over Shuffleboard, though both work

As for advice, use AdvantageScope for programming stuff and Elastic for driver stuff

I‚Äôm wondering if there‚Äôs a language barrier. Do you mean widgets? https://frc-elastic.gitbook.io/docs/customizing-your-dashboard/adding-and-customizing-widgets

Shuffleboard does support plugins for adding custom widgets, but that‚Äôs something I definetly wouldn‚Äôt spend time on right now.

agree, nobody looks at the dashboards anyway.

if you really need indicators (e.g. ‚Äúintake success‚Äù) then put a light on the robot itself: that‚Äôs what everyone is watching.
